allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Admin Cockpit, XR Engine, and Agent Orchestration System

Major additions:
- AdminCockpit with 8 modules \(Analytics, Users, Agents, XR, Voice, Prompts, Security, Config\)
- XREnvironmentEngine with spatial audio and WebXR support
- AgentOrchestrationSystem with 287 agents \(L0-L3 hierarchy\)
- AgentConversation chat interface with voice controls
- BrowserTab navigation components
- CanonicalLayout with 3 Hubs architecture
- OnboardingWizard \(7 steps\)
- AccreditationPage for partners
- Supabase schema for accreditations

New routes: /admin, /agent, /agent/:agentId

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
